name: Acid & Base
description:
You are the finest (and only) hitmen chemists.

Each of you posseses half the compound to eliminate your target.

Your target is visiting a club.

Your target has guards that will escort them out if they spot both of you.

Eliminate the target. Avoid being spotted. Eliminate guards if necessary. The future of your strange profession depends on it.

Created for the Brackeys 2021 game jam in 7 days (though the majority was done in the last 48 hours). Music, sound, modeling, texturing, and rigging were made in the last day 😂.
